name: Swift Agents Plugin
description: 43 production-ready AI agents for Claude Code with smart routing, cost optimization, and zero configuration
longDescription:
Swift Agents Plugin provides a curated library of specialized AI agents covering:

**Swift & iOS Development** (15 agents): Architecture patterns, SwiftUI, testing, modernization, CLI tools, server-side Swift, MCP servers, state machines, SPM, databases

**Testing & Quality** (7 agents): Test builders, code review, Swift Testing framework, Xcode integration, build runners, formatting, technical debt elimination

**Xcode & Build** (3 agents): Project configuration, Interface Builder, XIB/Storyboard management

**Documentation** (5 agents): Swift DocC, documentation verification, technical reviews, Deckset presentations, blog writing

**DevOps & CI/CD** (2 agents): Azure DevOps automation, Git PR/MR workflows

**Firebase & Analytics** (5 agents): Ecosystem analysis, Crashlytics debugging, cross-app patterns, architecture correlation

**Content & Publishing** (4 agents): Blog posts, Ghost CMS, conference talks, presentations

**Specialized Tools** (6 agents): Agent creation, plugin building, secrets management, timelines, CLI installation, intelligent routing

**Architecture** (2 agents): System design expert (Opus), Swift architecture specialist

**Key Features**:
- ğŸ§  Smart Routing: task-router agent uses local LLM (OWL Intelligence) for intelligent delegation
- ğŸ’° Cost Optimized: Mixed model strategy (1 Opus, 31 Sonnet, 11 Haiku)
- ğŸ”§ Zero Config: Agents work immediately after installation
- ğŸ“ Flexible: Global (all projects) or local (project-specific) installation
- ğŸš€ MCP Integration: 15 agents with built-in MCP server support (SwiftLens, Context7, SourceKit-LSP)
- âš¡ High Performance: 3-80x faster than baselines

screenshots.caption: Browse all 43 available agents with filtering
One-command installation to global or local

installation.quickInstall: git clone https://github.com/doozMen/swift-agents-plugin.git && cd swift-agents-plugin && swift package experimental-install --product claude-agents && claude-agents install --all --global
postInstall: echo 'âœ… Swift Agents Plugin installed successfully!'

features.name: Smart Agent Routing
features.description: task-router agent uses local LLM (OWL Intelligence) to intelligently delegate tasks to the best-suited agents

features.name: Cost Optimization
features.description: Mixed model strategy: 1 Opus (complex), 31 Sonnet (balanced), 11 Haiku (simple) for optimal cost/performance

features.name: Zero Configuration
features.description: All 43 agents embedded and production-ready. No setup files, no configuration hassle

features.name: MCP Integration
features.description: 15 agents with built-in MCP server support for SwiftLens, Context7, and SourceKit-LSP

features.name: Flexible Installation
features.description: Install globally (all projects) or locally (project-specific). Mix and match as needed

features.name: High Performance
features.description: Builds in 10.59s (3x baseline), lists in 0.025s (80x baseline), installs in 0.066s (15x baseline)

features.name: Comprehensive Coverage
features.description: 43 specialized agents covering Swift, testing, docs, CI/CD, Firebase, content, and architecture

features.name: Easy Discovery
features.description: Filter by tools, view descriptions, search by capability. Find the right agent instantly
